channel.title: Comments on: Fun with Pick Up Groups!

item.title: By: Kontract
item.dc:creator: Kontract
item.content:encoded:
It’s quite a bad trend actually, I had a friend convert from a non-jumpy paladin to a NE rogue and now he constantly jumps as well as me ðŸ˜›

Shhhh. itsnay on the lolodin-nay!

I know why rogues are jumping – no buffs to give. We poison up and that’s it – just wait for the others with their buffs and their mana. So in between complaining about wanting might AND kings, (“sticksalvationwherethesundontshineicanvanish”) one has to amuse one’s self – and seeing how many times out of ten your NElf does a tumble rather than a straight jump, then putting the results into a chart in Excel, hmm, I might be the only one to do that, eh?
::blushes::

item.title: By: Tre
item.dc:creator: Tre
item.description: Yeah, sorry about that... it was.... lag. Yeah, lag. That's it.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, sorry about that… it was…. lag. Yeah, lag. That’s it.

item.title: By: nordee
item.dc:creator: nordee
item.description: <blockquote>The tank starts telling the priest that he's healing incorrectly...</blockquote> ...and inexplicably starts dying on almost every pull after.
item.content:encoded:
The tank starts telling the priest that he’s healing incorrectly…

…and inexplicably starts dying on almost every pull after.

item.title: By: Agmon
item.dc:creator: Agmon
item.description:
They forgot one:
The tank starts telling the priest that he's healing incorrectly, the mage he's nuking incorrectly and that by God the rogue used the wrong opening move, all this in the middle of the first pull. Usually right after he's managed to hit the sheeped mob and the sapped mob with his Thunder Clap
item.content:encoded:
They forgot one:

The tank starts telling the priest that he’s healing incorrectly, the mage he’s nuking incorrectly and that by God the rogue used the wrong opening move, all this in the middle of the first pull. Usually right after he’s managed to hit the sheeped mob and the sapped mob with his Thunder Clap

item.title: By: Gheist
item.dc:creator: Gheist
item.content:encoded:
In no way am I exempt from jumping up and down incessantly. We all have a little PUG noobishness in us whether we like it or not.

Plus.. rogues are ADD

I constantly jump to amuse myself out of sheer bordem that are PUG groups. When I get in a guild only group .. I still jump because, shit I dunno why I just do. I’m neither 12 year old rogue-stereotype or have ADD it’s just something else to do. Mabbe Rogues lack buttons to press all the time and never have anything to do they amuse themselves.

It’s quite a bad trend actually, I had a friend convert from a non-jumpy paladin to a NE rogue and now he constantly jumps as well as me ðŸ˜›

As for when the group is formed and someone afk’s … well I have more trouble with guild groups like that, pre-TBC I never really had to 5/10 man with my guild much as most of us formed around teir1 era so my only experiance was leading the rabble, and our main emo-tank (thanks for the phrase btw) used to randomly AFK, usually when there was nasty trash to be cleared (you know pre-patch or pre faerlina boring long pulls) but more recently he’s been 5 manning with me and he ‘still’ insists on random afk without a word. If he wasn’t an officer I would have chucked his afk-ass outta the guild a long time ago.
